mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT FROM cafe_board ORDER BY num DESC) result1 ) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNum} AND rnum <= #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cafe_board (num, writer, title, content, viewCount, regdate) VALUES(cafe_board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer},#{title},#{content},#{viewCount}, SYSDATE)
